name: Ingot Systems
overview: Ingot Systems provides design solutions to fabless semiconductor and system companies. The company offers full-chip application-specific integrated circuit (ASIC) and system-on-chip (SoC) designs; field programmable gate-array designs; and system designs. It also provides ASIC/SoC design verification services; physical design services; and silicon prototyping/production services. The company, through its subsidiaries, offers its services in the form of various intellectual property (IP) solutions, which include memory controller solutions; and interface solutions that provide flow control, error handling, power management, and hot-plug/hot-swap support. It also provides video solutions, such as video decoder IP cores and video encoder IP cores; networking solutions, including bridge interface cores, switch interconnects cores, and encoder/decoder IP solutions; and Soc IP building blocks. The company operates design centers in Santa Clara, California and Pune, India. Ingot Systems was founded in 2003 and is based in Santa Clara, California. As of August 15, 2007, Ingot Systems, Inc. is a subsidiary of Virage Logic Corporation.
